column1: 1594314910711808002,1594314910711808002This weekend is #InternationalMensDay Here are a few kind words you can say to a man ( in your life or family ) :  1) You’re a gift 🎁 to the world 🌎  2) You matter 🫵🏼  3) Thank you for all the good you’ve done and continue to do. #ThinkBIGSundayWithMarsha https://t.co/EmuPfuTAT1 t_end
